Package gui

Class AddNoteFrameController

java.lang.Object
gui.AddNoteFrameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
IController
public class AddNoteFrameController extends Object implements IController
A frame controller for adding notes by librarian to History of a subscriber. In case of problems like if subscriber lost book.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage, Subscriber subscriber) throws IOException
      Starts the "Add Note" frame.
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - the main application stage.
      subscriber - the subscriber whose history is being modified.
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an error loading the FXML file.

    • getUpdateButton

      private void getUpdateButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws Exception
      Handles the update button click event. Adds the note to the subscriber's detailed history if the description field is not empty, and navigates back to the history frame.
      Parameters:
      event - the action event triggered by the button click.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while adding the note.

    • Back

      private void Back()
      Navigates back to the history frame and reinitializes it.
